nodes.text: Bloodsoup was a type of soup traditionally eaten by the Sith, who began consuming it after encountering the Anzati. The dark side organizations that adopted the culture of the ancient Sith also partook of it. During the New Sith Wars, this sort of soup was eaten by members of the Brotherhood of Darkness, including Darth Bane. Githany once offered Bane a bowl after he returned from her attempt to poison him.
